page.title: 06Cheshunt adults leisure
page.content: The women spend most of their time watching television and videos. Swimming is more popular than reading and keep fit. More women than men take their chldren to see friends, to visit relatives or go swimming. Men watch more T.V. than women and more men than women go out on their own each week to clubs, to the pub, fishing or golf. A few men take their children fishing or to football. Some men enjoy gardening. Lots of people go with their families to garden centres,swimming or to see relatives .A few go on walks. Parents who go out together go to nearby places like the local pub or restaurants.
